game.name: Kingdom: New Lands
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Remote Play on Phone, Remote Play on Tablet, Remote Play on TV, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Kingdom: New Lands builds upon the award-winning gameplay and mystery of Kingdom by introducing an abundance of new content to the IGF-nominated title while maintaining the simplicity and depth that legions of monarchs have come to experience and enjoy.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Kingdom: New Lands builds upon the award-winning gameplay and mystery of Kingdom by introducing an abundance of new content to the IGF-nominated title while maintaining the simplicity and depth that legions of monarchs have come to experience and enjoy.

reviewHighlights.text: Kingdom: New Lands enhances the Kingdom: Classic game by breaking the game up now into 5 different islands, each increasing in difficulty. Instead of...
Chill, beautiful, and kinda brutal. Kingdom: New Lands is all vibes, tough choices, and cozy pixel nights. Simple to play, hard to masterâ€”great game....
